snippet: CURLEY--The Honorable Walter J.P. The Executive Committee of the Pilgrims of the United States mourns the loss of our fellow member Ambassador Curley: diplomat, civic leader, businessman, historian and man of letters. We send condolences to his wife, Mary, and his family. Miner H. Warner, President Thomas L. Pulling, Secretary Peter Lawson-Johnston, Treasurer 1/3
lead_paragraph: CURLEY--The Honorable Walter J.P. The Executive Committee of the Pilgrims of the United States mourns the loss of our fellow member Ambassador Curley: diplomat, civic leader, businessman, historian and man of letters. We send condolences to his wife, Mary, and his family. Miner H. Warner, President Thomas L. Pulling, Secretary Peter Lawson-Johnston, Treasurer 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CURLEY, THE HONORABLE WALTER J.P
